title: Can i refound  Fiora ?
body: I don't like that rework so i want to refound {{champion:114}}   Can i refound she ?

replies.body: Yes, everyone gets three refunds. It's in the shop.
But he wants a refound and i dont think thats offered in the shop. Dont give the kid false hope please.

Um, it is.
If you check on Purchase History it tells you how many refunds you've got left.
Big hint: do not use them, ever. One day you'll need them for real. I've already used two, 'cause i'm an idiot.
The joke was that the OP said refound instead of refund and there is no such thing as a 'refound'
I don't think anyone has any refounds.

Up to three for each account.
Still, i think rito should limit them to RP purchase only. The amount of people who thought recycling IP was smart is unbelievable.
When you make an account you don't get three refounds. You get three refunds.

Why would you? She's not as bad as before.

Anyhow, if you really want to.
Open your client and go to the Shop, then go for Purchase History, scroll until you find Fiora and hit "refund".
Does not apply to any too old purchase.
Can only be done three times per account. No extras.
Should not be done unless you're absolutely sure.
Should *never* be used to *refund champions* as they change over time.
